title: Big East Commissioner on NIL
itunes:title: Big East Commissioner on NIL
description:
Big East Basketball is back in the hunt for both men's and women's national titles. Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch are joined by Big East Commissioner Val Ackerman, they discuss how the league sets itself apart, and where name, image and likeness rights go from here.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
